name: Floppy Cat (Gunnar Clovis)
description:
Floppy Cat

A simple game I made many years ago in early high school following a tutorial course by Benjamin Anderson, who's super sweet and just awesome. Simple, more chill Flappy Bird-type game. I felt the addition of the fishies was quite impactful in giving a risk-reward element to the game, and the bite sound effect is oooh very satisfying.

Controls

Click, tap, spacebar, any key, literally anything. That's it, bro
